source_prompt: The image presents a serene and minimalist living room setting. Dominating the scene is a wooden chair, its backrest adorned with a vase. The chair is positioned in front of a white sofa, which is accessorized with a single white pillow. Above the sofa, a white lamp hangs, casting a soft glow across the room. To the right of the sofa, a framed picture adds a personal touch to the space. The floor is covered with a beige rug, complementing the neutral color palette of the room.
target_prompt: The image presents a serene and minimalist living room setting. Dominating the scene is a wooden chair, its backrest adorned with a <sks>. The chair is positioned in front of a white sofa, which is accessorized with a single white pillow. Above the sofa, a white lamp hangs, casting a soft glow across the room. To the right of the sofa, a framed picture adds a personal touch to the space. The floor is covered with a beige rug, complementing the neutral color palette of the room.
fill_prompt: A tall and narrow vase with a narrow neck that transitions into a wider body. The body of the vase is adorned with a marbled pattern that gives it a unique texture. The color of the vase is predominantly red, with a gradient effect that transitions from a darker shade at the top to a lighter shade at the bottom.
